title: Rainy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a rainy city street with tall buildings and a motorcycle rider.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and cautiously due to the rainy weather and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians on the street.
